title: High degree of silanization of olive wood shell stone and its use in polyester biocomposites
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,1030-1039
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00475A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Melissa Olmedo-Navarro, Juana M. Pérez, Natalia Gutiérrez-Segura, Bernardo Sánchez-Sevilla, Yolanda Soriano-Jerez, Diego A. Alonso, Mari Carmen Cerón, Ignacio Fernández
A full optimization of the reaction conditions for the high degree of functionalization of olive wood shell stone (OS) with silanes of different nature has been conducted.
